9MTLKM2DJMZ2.title: Forza Horizon 5 Premium Edition
9MTLKM2DJMZ2.description: Limitless driving fun in an ever-evolving open world. The Premium Edition includes the FORZA HORIZON 5: RALLY ADVENTURE and Forza Horizon 5: Hot Wheels expansions, VIP, Car Pass and the Welcome Pack.

9NKX70BBCDRN.title: Forza Horizon 5 Standard Edition
9NKX70BBCDRN.description: Limitless driving fun in an ever-evolving open world.

9P2N57MC619K.title: Sea of Thieves 2023 Edition
9P2N57MC619K.description: Celebrate five years since Sea of Thieves' launch with this special edition, including a copy of the game with all permanent content added since launch, plus a 10,000 gold bonus and a selection of Hunter cosmetics: the Hunter Cutlass, Pistol, Compass, Hat, Jacket and Sails.

9P1HX37NMJLT.title: Forza Horizon 5 Deluxe Edition
9P1HX37NMJLT.description: Limitless driving fun in an ever-evolving open world. The Deluxe Edition includes the full game and Car Pass.

9N54CX9XJBP6.title: Forza Horizon 5 and Forza Horizon 4 Premium Editions Bundle
9N54CX9XJBP6.description: Get the Forza Horizon 5 Premium Edition and Forza Horizon 4 Ultimate Edition in one bundle. Features four epic expansions, including Rally Adventure, Hot Wheels, Fortune Island, and LEGO® Speed Champions.

9MZ0SR207MG8.title: Forza Horizon 5 Premium Add-Ons Bundle
9MZ0SR207MG8.description: The Forza Horizon 5 Premium Add-Ons Bundle includes FORZA HORIZON 5: RALLY ADVENTURE, Forza Horizon 5: Hot Wheels, VIP, Car Pass and the Welcome Pack. This add-on requires Forza Horizon 5 (game sold separately).

9P7V09FQ5C56.title: Forza Horizon 5 + 4 Premium Upgrade Bundle
9P7V09FQ5C56.description: Xbox Game Pass members, complete your Forza Horizon 5 and Forza Horizon 4 experience with the Premium Upgrade Bundle. Features four epic expansions, including Rally Adventure, Hot Wheels, Fortune Island and LEGO® Speed Champions.

9PNSZ7GMWCQZ.title: Forza Horizon 5: Hot Wheels
9PNSZ7GMWCQZ.description: Calling all daredevil drivers! Blast off to the visually stunning, exhilarating Horizon Hot Wheels Park in the clouds high above Mexico. Race 10 amazing new cars on the fastest, most extreme tracks ever devised. Design, build, and share your own Hot Wheels adventure.

9NLX3GWW0HF1.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel
9NLX3GWW0HF1.description:
"We have to fight! If we don't, everyone we love will be taken away!"

One fateful night, a peaceful village is thrown into the flames of war. Determined to save their families, a group of children boards a giant tank and begins an offensive charge!

Fuga: Melodies of Steel is an RPG where you place children, each with their own unique characteristics and skills, at different gun turrets in a tank to fight against the enemy.

Living inside the tank, the children show emotion and gain affinity amongst each other. Manage these both to change the outcome of their journey!

BXLL06QN8HVP.title: Back 4 Blood
BXLL06QN8HVP.description: Back 4 Blood is a thrilling cooperative first-person shooter from the creators of the critically acclaimed Left 4 Dead franchise. Experience the intense 4 player co-op narrative campaign, competitive multiplayer as human or Ridden, and frenetic gameplay that keeps you in the action.

9PL4GX47GT7K.title: Penbook
9PL4GX47GT7K.description:
Penbook is the nicest freehand writing experience on Windows.

Windows App Creator of the Year Finalist!

Take notes, plan your day (or year), draw a sketch, or do your math homework. Penbook includes dozens of kinds of stationery, from graph paper to sheet music. You can even import your own photos or PDFs to write on.

Keep your work organized with beautiful, customizable notebook covers. Create in portrait or landscape mode, and share and export your work with just a few taps. 

Penbook was built for pens (but you can use your finger or a mouse, if you want), and includes support for Surface Dial. 

--

Penbook's team can support your enterprise deployment. See our Enterprise page for more detail.

BTC0L0BW6LWC.title: Mortal Kombat 11
BTC0L0BW6LWC.description: Mortal Kombat 11 is the latest installment in the critically acclaimed franchise, providing a deeper and more personalised experience than ever before. The all new Custom Character Variations give you unprecedented control of your fighters to make them your own.

9NT4X7P8B9NB.title: State of Decay 2: Juggernaut Edition
9NT4X7P8B9NB.description: State of Decay 2: Juggernaut Edition is an improved version of the popular zombie survival game and includes the all-new Homecoming Update – a fully remastered, open world version of Trumbull Valley for the core game, reintegrating the Mount Tanner and Fairfield regions to the map, and adding new sites to scavenge, along with new sights to behold.

9N8CD0XZKLP4.title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
9N8CD0XZKLP4.description:
Play the critically acclaimed masterpiece.

Embark on a journey in a vast, exotic world, fully optimized for Xbox Series X and Xbox Series S. In this must-play sequel to the award winning Ori and the Blind Forest, Ori is no stranger to peril, but it will take more than bravery to reunite a family, heal a broken land, and discover Ori’s true destiny.

9NWZTB9JQG9S.title: Yakuza 4 Remastered for Windows 10
9NWZTB9JQG9S.description:
Experience the fourth chapter of the Kazuma Kiryu saga in 1080p and 60fps.

2010, Tokyo.  A shooting incident one night in a red-light district sets the city swirling with human desires and clamor. It was supposed to be a "common incident" for this town... until the appearance of one woman burdened with sorrow. As if drawn to a flame, men of the city's dark underground are gathered, one after another, at the door of the "legendary yakuza" Kazuma Kiryu.

As the fates of these four men overlap, the story of a miracle created by the passionate and violent way of life begins to takes shape.

Take control of multiple protagonists, a first for the series, allowing for unprecedented story depth and battle action. Three new protagonists, each with a rich personality, will leave their impact before the story concludes.

Complete The Dragon of Dojima’s journey.

9P65DCKJFTJ3.title: Screenbits - Screen Recorder
9P65DCKJFTJ3.description: Ultimate screen recorder software for game recording, video tutorials, product demos, YouTube videos and more. Screenbits allows you to capture screen content, system sound, microphone and camera into HD/4K quality video files. With a reasonable price, it has all the features you expect from a screen recording software provided in an easy to use interface.

9P3PL76N0KWZ.title: Rush: A DisneyPixar Adventure
9P3PL76N0KWZ.description: “Rush: A Disney•Pixar Adventure,” invites families and fans of all ages to experience the worlds of six beloved Disney•Pixar films like never before. Play cooperatively and team up with characters from “The Incredibles,” “Ratatouille,” “Up,” “Cars”, “Toy Story”, and “Finding Dory” or a friend to solve puzzles and uncover hidden secrets all remastered in 4K Ultra HD and HDR.

9NR7XDNVP5SW.title: As Dusk Falls
9NR7XDNVP5SW.description: As Dusk Falls is an original interactive drama from INTERIOR/NIGHT that explores the entangled lives of two families across thirty years. Starting in 1998 with a robbery-gone-wrong in small town Arizona, the choices you make have a powerful impact on the characters’ lives in this uncompromising story of betrayal, sacrifice and resilience. Drive the lives and relationships of multiple characters in a decades-spanning story told across two intense books.

9PJ06TZX4NMH.title: Zoo Tycoon: Ultimate Animal Collection
9PJ06TZX4NMH.description: The wildly popular Zoo Tycoon series gets fully-remastered and set to crank up the excitement, challenge, and fun of building the ultimate zoo. Let your imagination run wild with "Zoo Tycoon: Ultimate Animal Collection" Build, manage, and maintain your dream zoo alone or with up to four players on Xbox LIVE.  This zoo simulation will charm animal lovers of all ages.

9MZNFNN3XJ3F.title: Yakuza Kiwami 2 for Windows 10
9MZNFNN3XJ3F.description: The Tojo Clan and Omi Alliance are on the brink of war. Kazuma Kiryu, the Dragon of Dojima, enters as a broker of peace, but Ryuji Goda, the Dragon of Kansai, will stop at nothing to start an all-out war. In this world, there can only be one dragon.

9NS84HCWZD8B.title: Rise of Nations: Extended Edition
9NS84HCWZD8B.description: Join the over 2 million Rise of Nations fans. Master 6,000 years of history, from the Ancient Age to the Information Age. What forces will you wield to lead your nation to global prominence? Trade, espionage, diplomacy…war? Whichever path you choose, you’ll discover the pulse-pounding thrill and speed of real-time strategy gaming combined with the epic scope and depth of turn-based strategy games – brought together for the first time ever in Rise of Nations.

9NBLGGH1Z6FB.title: Ori and the Blind Forest: Definitive Edition
9NBLGGH1Z6FB.description: Ori and the Blind Forest is a must-play, award winning franchise that tells the tale of a young orphan destined for heroics, through a visually stunning Action-Platformer crafted by Moon Studios. Featuring hand-painted artwork, meticulously animated character performance, a fully orchestrated score and dozens of new features in the Definitive Edition, “Ori and the Blind Forest” explores a deeply emotional story about love and sacrifice, and the hope that exists in us all.

9NG06CSMM97P.title: Wreckfest
9NG06CSMM97P.description:
Break the rules and take full-contact racing to the limit with Wreckfest! 

Expect epic crashes, neck-to-neck fights over the finish line and brand-new ways for metal to bend – These are the once-in-a-lifetime moments that can only be achieved in Wreckfest, with its true-to-life physics simulation crafted by legendary developer Bugbear, who also brought you FlatOut 1 & 2!

Burn rubber and shred metal in the ultimate driving playground!

9NSDVZ72V6P2.title: Ram Booster: Memory Cleaner
9NSDVZ72V6P2.description:
RAM Booster Memory Cleaner is a powerful and efficient optimization tool for Windows devices available on the Microsoft Store. This user-friendly app is designed to clean, optimize, and enhance your device's performance by freeing up RAM and improving memory usage. With its advanced algorithms and intuitive interface, RAM Booster Memory Cleaner ensures that your device runs smoothly and efficiently, providing an improved user experience and extended device longevity.

Key Features:

RAM Optimization: Automatically detect and free up unused RAM, enhancing your device's performance and reducing lag.

Memory Cleaning: Thoroughly clean your device's memory by removing unnecessary background processes, thus preventing slow-downs and crashes.

Real-time Monitoring: Monitor your device's RAM usage in real-time, allowing you to keep track of your system's performance and identify potential issues.

One-Click Boost: Instantly optimize your device's RAM usage with just one click, making the process fast and hassle-free.

Auto-Optimization: Schedule automatic RAM optimization and memory cleaning at intervals that suit your needs, ensuring consistent performance without manual intervention.

Whitelist Management: Exclude specific apps from the cleaning process to protect essential programs and processes from being terminated.

Startup Optimization: Improve your device's startup speed by disabling unnecessary startup programs, allowing for faster boot times.

User-Friendly Interface: Easily navigate through RAM Booster Memory Cleaner's clean and intuitive interface, designed for users of all skill levels.

Advanced Settings: Customize your optimization preferences, tailoring the cleaning process to your specific needs and requirements.

Windows Store Compatibility: Designed exclusively for the Microsoft Windows Store, RAM Booster Memory Cleaner seamlessly integrates with your Windows device for a smooth user experience.

Boost your device's performance and extend its lifespan with RAM Booster Memory Cleaner, the ultimate optimization tool for Windows devices. Don't compromise on speed or efficiency; trust RAM Booster Memory Cleaner to keep your system running at its peak, ensuring a consistently smooth and enjoyable user experience.

9WZDNCRFHWFD.title: Hydro Thunder Hurricane
9WZDNCRFHWFD.description: This sequel to Midway’s legendary arcade racer features amazing dynamic water physics, transformable rocket-powered boats, gorgeous visuals and over-the-top interactive environments like Area 51 and the Bermuda Triangle.   Conquer four game modes – Races, Ring Masters, Gauntlet, Championships -- and race against your Friends’ best performances in the all-new Ghost Race!

C2KDNLT2H7DM.title: Gears 5
C2KDNLT2H7DM.description: From one of gaming’s most acclaimed sagas, Gears 5’s celebrated campaign and refreshed multiplayer are fully optimized for Xbox Series X|S. With all-out war descending, Kait Diaz breaks away to uncover her connection to the enemy and discovers the true danger to Sera – herself.

9NBLGGH6H0RV.title: Quantum Break
9NBLGGH6H0RV.description: From Remedy Entertainment, the masters of cinematic action games such as Max Payne and Alan Wake, comes Quantum Break, a time-amplified suspenseful blockbuster. The Quantum Break experience is part game, part live action show—where decisions in one dramatically affect the other.

9N6Z8DQXSQWH.title: Disneyland Adventures
9N6Z8DQXSQWH.description: Disneyland Adventures allows children and Disney fans of all ages to explore Disneyland park in 4K Ultra HD and HDR, enjoy immersive adventures based on 18 popular attractions, engage in 100 challenging quests, and interact with 35 beloved Disney characters.  Disneyland Adventures is your ticket to the magical world of Disneyland right in your living room.

9N4XF19XFJD8.title: AirPlayReceiver: Screen Mirroring & Streaming
9N4XF19XFJD8.description:
This app turns your PC and Xbox into an AirPlay receiver/server, allowing you to wirelessly mirror the screen and audio of your iPhone, iPad or Mac!

You can also use AirPlay to cast videos and music to your PC and Xbox and enjoy them on a bigger screen with better sound!

Play music with AirPlay in the background while gaming on your PC or Xbox!

Allows you to choose the most suitable picture quality by setting resolution and frame rate according to network conditions and device performance.

No need to install any 3rd party apps on your iPhone, iPad or Mac, just connect to the same network!

9NBR2VXT87SJ.title: Psychonauts 2
9NBR2VXT87SJ.description: Combining quirky missions and mysterious conspiracies, Psychonauts 2 is a platform-adventure game with cinematic style and tons of customizable psychic powers.

9NCVGPDNZ72H.title: AirPlay Receivers - Sreen Mirroring
9NCVGPDNZ72H.description:
This app enables users to stream content from their iPhones, iPads, or Macs directly to their Windows PCs. This means users can view photos, watch videos, listen to music, or stream content from apps like Netflix, Hulu, or YouTube on their PC using the AirPlay Receiver app. The app is useful for people who don't have an Apple TV or an Apple device and want to enjoy their media on a larger screen.

The AirPlay Receiver allowing Apple devices to detect and connect to it over the Wi-Fi network. To ensure proper connectivity, please make sure that your iPhone/iPad devices are connected to the same network as your PC. Once connected, users can choose the PC as the output device for their media, and the app will start streaming the content to the PC.

9N63G96B77R1.title: Templates for PowerPoint - Animated Slides Templates
9N63G96B77R1.description: Creating an impressive PowerPoint presentation has never been this simple. Packed with captivating animations and eye-catching graphics, our slides are designed to leave a lasting impression on your audience. Customize colors, mix and match slides between templates, and achieve extraordinary results with ease.

9NNLBL0T2Z43.title: Sunset Overdrive
9NNLBL0T2Z43.description: Sunset Overdrive transforms an open-world apocalypse into your tactical playground. Zip, grind and wall-run across Sunset City while using a devastating, unconventional arsenal. With hyper-agility, unique weapons, and customizable special abilities, Sunset Overdrive rewrites the rules of traditional shooters and delivers an explosive and irreverent adventure in the end times.

9PC5NPMR2C1B.title: OCR Image Text Extractor
9PC5NPMR2C1B.description: Extract text from an image, PDF and handwriting, translate, save, search and export the extracted text.

9PD0BJRBLRJM.title: Yakuza 0 for Windows 10
9PD0BJRBLRJM.description: The glitz, glamor, and unbridled decadence of the 80s are back in Yakuza 0. Fight your way through Tokyo and Osaka with protagonist Kazuma Kiryu and series regular Goro Majima.

9NBLGGH5WLR0.title: Halo Wars: Definitive Edition
9NBLGGH5WLR0.description: Halo Wars: Definitive Edition is an enhanced version of the real-time strategy classic, Halo Wars, updated to run natively on Xbox One and Windows 10. Halo Wars: Definitive Edition includes improved graphics, new achievements and all of the DLC created for the landmark strategy game.

9N8VS0FL4BG2.title: Railway Empire 2 - Digital Deluxe Edition (Win)
9N8VS0FL4BG2.description: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the full Railway Empire 2 game, the original soundtrack, exclusive skins for each of the three sizes of your railway stations, an exclusive skin for your company HQ, and an exclusive skin for two locomotives.

9NDXLPW4TTF2.title: Railway Empire 2 (Win)
9NDXLPW4TTF2.description: All aboard the express train to riches and fame in Railway Empire 2! Grow your company into the largest railway company of the continent and outsmart your competitors as you connect cities and companies with an ever-expanding network of rail lines, bridges, and tunnels.

9NGDDQDNCNK2.title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – Return of Rome
9NGDDQDNCNK2.description: Return of Rome brings the original Age of Empires into Age of Empires II: DE as a brand new, self-contained experience. Relive the triumph and trials of antiquity with the original sixteen civilizations — plus one brand-new civilization, the Lac Viet.

9NCQBSH49JLW.title: Boss Rush: Mythology (Windows)
9NCQBSH49JLW.description: Take on the role of a mysterious knight who travels across different worlds in search of the most difficult opponents. Fight famous enemies from Greek, Scandinavian, Slavic and Egyptian mythologies and show everyone who is the strongest warrior! Only boss fights, only hardcore!

9NWK696W49SK.title: Fast Disk Cleanup
9NWK696W49SK.description:
Fast Disk Clean is a highly efficient and lightning-fast file cleaning software that is designed to help users free up valuable space on their computers. This software is specifically designed to quickly and effectively remove unnecessary files, temporary files, and junk files from a computer, thereby helping to optimize the system's performance.

One of the key features of Fast Disk Clean is its speed. Unlike many other file cleaning software programs that can take a long time to scan and clean a computer's hard drive, Fast Disk Clean works incredibly quickly, allowing users to clean their computer in just a matter of minutes. This is especially useful for those who have limited time and want to quickly optimize their system's performance.

Another benefit of Fast Disk Clean is its efficiency. This software is designed to quickly and effectively identify and remove a wide range of unnecessary files, including temporary files, system logs, internet cache files, and more. This means that users can be confident that they are removing all of the files that are taking up valuable space on their computer, without having to worry about accidentally deleting any important files.

In addition to its speed and efficiency, Fast Disk Clean is also incredibly easy to use. The software has a simple and intuitive user interface that makes it easy for users to scan and clean their computer's hard drive with just a few clicks. This means that even those who are not tech-savvy can use the software without any problems.

Another great feature of Fast Disk Clean is its customizability. The software allows users to choose which files and folders they want to scan and clean, giving them complete control over the cleaning process. This means that users can choose to focus on specific areas of their computer's hard drive, or they can choose to scan and clean everything.

Overall, Fast Disk Clean is an incredibly efficient and fast file cleaning software that is perfect for anyone looking to optimize their computer's performance. With its speed, efficiency, ease of use, and customizability, Fast Disk Clean is the perfect tool for anyone who wants to free up valuable space on their computer and keep it running smoothly.

9PJ82PPC7XGM.title: QR Code & Barcode Scanner
9PJ82PPC7XGM.description:
It's time to upgrade from old QR and barcode scanner techniques to smart QR and barcode scanner techniques.

This app has almost every new feature for scanning and reading barcodes and QR codes.

9PB1187XWXT6.title: Elegant Video Editing
9PB1187XWXT6.description: This is a video editing software, a simple and efficient lossless video editing software

9P3CFT9QZNX5.title: Titans Pinball
9P3CFT9QZNX5.description: Beat the Titans in the most entertaining Pinball!

9P3DFTDTX1J6.title: The Excrawlers (Windows 10)
9P3DFTDTX1J6.description: Excrawlers is an action-RPG rougelike game in which you and other heroes will embark into dark atmospheric dungeons and realms full of monsters and madness. Embark into parallel realms, defeat ancient monsters and find your way out!

9MZXGTFBDKBJ.title: Mia and the Dragon Princess
9MZXGTFBDKBJ.description: A live-action, interactive buddy-action movie following Mia, a plucky barmaid whose life is thrown into chaos when a mysterious woman turns up at her workplace, on the run from a group of violent thugs and unable to speak English.

9PL2036VX3NB.title: Unzip Me
9PL2036VX3NB.description: Manage compressed files (zip, gz, bzip2, tar) and decompressed files (rar, zip, 7zip, gz, bzip2, tar).

9PC4GHPKL8QR.title: HTML Editor Plus
9PC4GHPKL8QR.description:
The best web development editor in the Microsoft store with the following features:

- Lightweight
- Supported by all browsers
- Most friendly search engine
- Integrate easily with other languages
- The basics of all programming languages

9PNLVDQD2LB9.title: Teleprompter Pro App
9PNLVDQD2LB9.description:
I present to you the most powerful app for getting words from a script.

It helps you in the following areas:

- Spontaneity

- Effective pacing

- Precise communication

9PHB4W1HBMSR.title: Circle Photo Maker
9PHB4W1HBMSR.description: Circle Photo Maker is an app that makes it easy to create stunning circle photos for social media. It provides an array of editing tools, frame and colors, so you can customize your photos and make them stand out.

9NW8LZCVJMQF.title: Creepy Tale 2
9NW8LZCVJMQF.description: Experience the creepy tension of a Brothers Grimm fairy tale in this puzzle adventure game. Follow the young and brave Lars as he embarks on a dangerous journey to save his sister!

9PJ2X9JC1N3N.title: Hyper­ Drift
9PJ2X9JC1N3N.description: Get ready to hit the open road in "Hyper Drift" - the ultimate racing and drifting game of the winter season! With its fast-paced gameplay, thrilling drifting mechanics, and stunning visuals, this game is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat as you race to clear the snow-covered roads.

9N1XZMNTZBGK.title: UDM - Universal Download Manager
9N1XZMNTZBGK.description:
Accelerate your downloads by up to 6 times!
Download any kind of files from almost anywhere, even from YouTube, etc.

Universal Download Manager (UDM) is a tool to increase download speeds by up to 6 times.
Install Universal Download Manager (UDM) to stop waiting for your downloads. You will be truly amazed how fast UDM downloads your files.
UDM is not the first download manager ever, but for sure is the fastest on the market (even up to 25% faster than Internet Download Manager (IDM)).
Our powerful download engine uses unique algorithms to receive Internet data in the fastest possible way. UDM will accelerate downloads to all times because of its innovative dynamic file segmentation technology.

9NWXDDCKNQKS.title: CreativePrint - INDD Print Templates Collection
9NWXDDCKNQKS.description: Elevate your graphic design projects with Print Templates for InDesign, a versatile and user-friendly app featuring 50 top-notch InDesign templates for creative cloud users. Designed by industry-leading professionals, these print design templates cater to a variety of styles and industries, empowering you to create visually striking and memorable designs for any occasion.

9ND8PGBZS55X.title: DesignFlow Pro: Print and Social Media Templates Collection
9ND8PGBZS55X.description: Discover the ultimate design resource with DesignFlow Pro: your all-in-one destination for high-quality Figma templates and social media templates! Elevate your graphic design projects with our expertly crafted collection, designed to inspire and streamline your creative process. Get started today by downloading from the Microsoft Store.

9N677BC82LFD.title: VectorMaster: Premium Templates for Illustrator
9N677BC82LFD.description: Discover a world of endless creativity with Illustrator Templates for Print Design – the revolutionary app that enhances your graphic design prowess. Unleash your artistic potential with our comprehensive library of 50 top-notch Adobe Illustrator templates, meticulously curated by industry-leading experts to make your projects truly distinctive.

9PNK77Q5FWMJ.title: All-in-One Mail
9PNK77Q5FWMJ.description:
Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo mail, Proton, AOL Mail, Zoho Mail, Yandex Mail, Titan, 10 Minute Mail - All Mail Services in One App 😊.

Tired of switching between multiple Tabs or Apps to keep a tab on your emails.

Here is the solution. This App is a unified solution for all Mail Services that offer a wide variety of mail services. With All-in-One Mail, you don't need to search for your mail, in dozens of apps or multiple tabs.

List of supported Mail Services:
+ Gmail - Use Mail on Gmail. Make video calls from Google Meet. Use Chat feature
+ Outlook - Use Mail on Outlook. Make video calls. Use Chat feature

+ Zoho Mail - Use Mail on Zoho
+ Yandex - Use Mail on Yandex

Features:
1.	Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo mail, Proton, AOL Mail, Zoho Mail, Yandex Mail, Titan, 10 Minute Mail - All Mail Services in One App 😊.

5.	Intuitive interface to enhance user experience

Disclaimer: We are not affiliated with any Mail Services listed above.

9PDRTJ72X077.title: C2W PDF Editor
9PDRTJ72X077.description: Our app is a powerful and intuitive PDF editor that allows you to edit, annotate, organize, merge, and extract text from your PDF documents with ease.  With features such as form filling, page editing, annotation tools, and a comprehensive edit history log, you can streamline your workflow and increase productivity.

9PLM4H376TLF.title: Two Player PARA SHOOT
9PLM4H376TLF.description: "Two Player PARA SHOOT" is a fun and engaging 2D shooter game for PC and Xbox that is sure to provide hours of entertainment for players of all ages. With its colorful, cartoonish graphics, this game offers a unique and exciting gaming experience.

9P5FHB4Q3KLB.title: All-in-One Movies, Videos, Series & Shows
9P5FHB4Q3KLB.description: Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, Disney+, HBO Max, Hulu, Peacock TV, Pluto TV, Tubi TV, Twitch, YouTube TV, Curiosity - Stream all in one app 😊.

9N09XHDWHG3M.title: C2W Employee Time Clock System
9N09XHDWHG3M.description: Streamline your employee time tracking and simplify payroll management with our user-friendly time clock app. Our app offers features such as time tracking, reporting, access control, and RFID functionality, all on a flexible and adaptable platform.

9NG155GJRQ4W.title: KeyLights - Visualize Key Presses
9NG155GJRQ4W.description: Visualizes your keyboard activity in real-time. With KeyLights, you can see exactly which keys and mouse buttons you're pressing

9NFJCL2TM5N9.title: File Locker X
9NFJCL2TM5N9.description: Protect your sensitive data with our app's password protection feature. Easily decrypt your data back with our user-friendly interface.

9NRN7QR49HKN.title: Fantasy chess
9NRN7QR49HKN.description: Enter into the epic world of Fantasy Chess, as you lead your powerful army of fighting characters into an intense and strategical battle for dominance on the chessboard. Choose your characters carefully, each with unique abilities and strengths to defeat your opponents and conquer their kingdom.

9PM30DV03177.title: City Runner: street animals
9PM30DV03177.description: Welcome to Trash Cat, the endless runner game that will keep you on the edge of your seat! Join our feline hero as she sprints through a city filled with obstacles, including garbage cans, pesky mice, and tricky barriers. You'll need quick reflexes and lightning-fast moves to jump, slide, and dodge your way to victory.

9P8Q3HNRCDRP.title: Puzzle Game Collection HD Block
9P8Q3HNRCDRP.description: Welcome to Puzzle Game Collection HD Block, the ultimate puzzle game for all puzzle enthusiasts! Get ready to dive into a world of challenging and entertaining puzzles that will keep you engaged for hours on end.

9PGW9J3BN2B2.title: Bricks Out Block Puzzle
9PGW9J3BN2B2.description: Welcome to Bricks Out Block Puzzle! Get ready to enjoy a classic arcade-style breakout game with a twist. With amazing graphics and multiple gameplay modes, this game is sure to keep you entertained for hours.

9NMLNSQ5DBWX.title: Eternal
9NMLNSQ5DBWX.description:
Make History

One man fights for himself. One man fights for all.

Be one of the first to experience Eternal, an intoxicating journey into the nature of humanity.



※Special Limited-Time Bonus:  For a limited time, owners of Eternal receive Psychomachia ('Eternal Psychomachia GOLD') FREE.

9PPQJBRB2KH0.title: Spaceship Orbit Puzzle Game
9PPQJBRB2KH0.description: Get ready to embark on a thrilling interstellar adventure with Spaceship Orbit Puzzle Game! This puzzle and strategy game will put your skills to the test as you navigate your spaceship through a series of rotating orbits. Match four stone balls of the same color in each orbit by rotating them and advance to the next level. But be warned, the levels are full of surprises, including teleportation, different rotations, and other exciting elements that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

9NSKR4S8GWX0.title: Starship Space Game
9NSKR4S8GWX0.description: Get ready to embark on an epic space adventure with Starship Space Game! Take control of your own starship and engage in heart-pumping battles against enemy spaceships. The game is set in the Minecraft universe, adding a fun and colorful twist to the gameplay. As you progress through the levels, you'll encounter obstacles, enemies, and power-ups that will help you on your journey. One of the unique features of Maze Baller - Minecraft Edition is its dynamic level generation, which ensures that each play through is different and offers a new and exciting challenge. The game also features stunning 3D graphics and immersive sound effects, bringing the Minecraft world to life. With its addictive gameplay and challenging levels, Maze Baller - Minecraft Edition is sure to provide hours of fun for players of all ages and skill levels.

The goal is to expose the tiles under the matched pairs for further play, and the game is won when all pairs have been removed from the board. The game also comes with hints and a helper guide for new players, an undo button in-game, and very smooth and interesting animations. This game is suitable for players of all ages and is perfect for anyone looking for a challenging and entertaining puzzle game.

9P7DDG281731.title: Quick Search (Pro) - Search Everything
9P7DDG281731.description:
Quick Search (Pro)

"Quick Search" is a search engine that locates files and folders by filename instantly for Windows.

Unlike Windows search, "Quick Search" initially displays every file and folder on your computer (hence the name "Quick Search").

You type in a search filter to limit what files and folders are displayed.


How long will it take to index my files?
"Quick Search" only indexes file and folder names and generally takes a few seconds to build its database.

A fresh installation of Windows 10 (about 120,000 files) will take about 1 second to index.

1,000,000 files will take about 1 minute.

9P6G4L8BRP4K.title: The Oregon Trail
9P6G4L8BRP4K.description:
The Oregon Trail™ by Gameloft—Experience The Oregon Trail™ like never before. A modern twist on the trials and tribulations of the road to Oregon, this official successor to the global phenomenon will immerse players in exhilarating journeys ranging from the historically accurate to the totally extreme. Players will pick their traveling party, stock the wagon with supplies, and embark on an adventure filled with tough choices, new dangers, and unexpected situations. Surviving blizzards, broken limbs, snakebites, exhaustion, starvation, and the dreaded dysentery is no small feat; all the while navigating an untamed frontier to get your party to their new life in Oregon before the winter. Track down a missing party in the aftermath of a fierce blizzard, transport volatile gunpowder through blistering desert heat, compete in challenging hunting mini-games, and meet a broad cast of historic figures. With procedurally selected random events where players’ choices affect their party and future game events, there’s always a new adventure on the horizon every time you play.


Always a New Adventure

• Build and name your party from different classes—each with their own starting items, skills, and personalities—to make every journey to Oregon unique.

• Overcome hundreds of random events where your choices affect the fate of your travelers, and are influenced by their unique skills and traits.

• Remember to take care of your party, wagon, and oxen, or they’ll become casualties of the trail.


Fresh Features

• Take on 15 playable Journeys.

• Experience 7 Quests inspired by historical events.

• Monitor your party members’ health, morale, stamina and hygiene.

• Manage your inventory to squeeze everything you can into the wagon.

• Maintain your wagon to prevent breakdowns and inventory loss from spoiling or spillage.

• Learn about real people and places in your interactive Journal.

• Collect and learn about the many interesting animals you’ll see on the trail.

• Catch 80+ species in the new Fishing mini-game.

• Obtain 140+ achievements.


True to the Original

• Hunting and Rafting make a long-awaited return, with faithful gameplay and all-new visuals.

• Dysentery, river fording, broken legs, and many more classic hazards await!


Striking Art Direction and Score

• A beautiful blend of charming pixel art characters, 3D environments and cutting-edge lighting and visual effects creates a unique visual style that’s both nostalgic and contemporary.

• An all-original soundtrack of alt-country-inspired music combined with 8-bit-style sound effects.


Respectful Representation

• For the first time, the game features Native American playable characters and stories, celebrating the history and cultures of the peoples who first lived on this land and still live here today.

• Thorough research and multiple academic consultants were involved in this game’s production to ensure accuracy and respectful representation of all peoples depicted in the game.


Officially Licensed & Supported

• The Oregon Trail™ is an officially licensed game from HarperCollins Productions, who supported the evolution of The Oregon Trail™ so it would be true to the original, but with updated gameplay and visuals.

• 2016 Video Game Hall of Fame inductee.
_____________________________________________

9P7CVP0HG5V9.title: Clobbr - API load & speed test
9P7CVP0HG5V9.description:
Clobbr is a developer tool that allows you to test your api endpoints to see how well they perform under multiple requests (clobber your apis!), in sequence or parallel.

Regardless if you're testing a REST, GraphQL or cloud function Clobbr has got you covered!


Powerful, yet simple and delightful user interface.
---------------------------------------------------
• Make requests to multiple endpoints with ease.
• Set up request timeouts, headers, payload and much more
• Explore results as a beautiful list, summarizing your settings
• Analyse charts with response times and easily re-run tests
• Delve into key stats such as standard deviation, percentiles and more


Configure requests.
---------------------
• Easily configure verb (GET, PUT, POST etc.)
• Set number of iterations
• Toggle between http/s with ease


Send data with a request.
---------------------------
• Set data in the built-in JSON editor
• Include in POST, PUT etc requests
• Save data settings between runs


Set headers with ease.
------------------------
• Configure headers for each request
• Use scripts to get/set dynamic headers
• Save header settings between runs


Explore result history.
----------------------
• Understand how key statistics evolve over time
• Explore historical response timings using charts
• Analyze historical data in detail in the tabular view


Take control of the UI.
------------------------
• Toggle between light or dark modes
• Clear data with ease
• Customise app behaviour with advanced settings


Share results with ease.
--------------------------
• Share results with your team with the push of a button
• Quickly share result charts and key statistics
• No data is stored on a server and sensitive info is stripped


All data stored locally. Your privacy comes first.
------------------------------------------------
• None of the request or result data is stored on a server
• No account needed
• No tracking whatsoever

9NLBW0CC9RK0.title: Templates for Bussiness - Bussiness Templates
9NLBW0CC9RK0.description:
In Microsoft Word,Excel PPT templates are pre-designed documents that you or someone else (such as Microsoft) creates to use as a pattern for a project. The template could be for a business card, brochure, resume, presentation...the list goes on. Regardless of the purpose, templates provide the design consistency that any organization (or individual) needs to look professional.

The template contains a specific layout, style, design and, sometimes, fields and text that are common to every use of that template. Some templates are so complete (such as business cards), you only have to change the individual’s name, phone number, and email address. Others, such as business reports or brochures, could require that everything is changed except the layout and design.

Once you create a template, you can use it over and over. Remember that while you open a template to start a project, you save the project as another file type, such as the basic .docx Word format, for editing, sharing, printing, and more. The template file stays the same, unless or until you want to change it


Our product is not a free product because of the huge development effort.

9PKZ6GX66VZ4.description: It's like a Monster Truck Rollercoaster ride! Get ready for a fun filled adventure spread over fifteen levels. Choose your truck or unlock new favorites. Next select your level and compete on the leaderboards for the best time on each.

9NVBMF0BJBDM.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel - Deluxe Edition
9NVBMF0BJBDM.description:
"We have to fight! If we don't, everyone we love will be taken away!"

One fateful night, a peaceful village is thrown into the flames of war. Determined to save their families, a group of children boards a giant tank and begins an offensive charge!

Fuga: Melodies of Steel is an RPG where you place children, each with their own unique characteristics and skills, at different gun turrets in a tank to fight against the enemy.

Living inside the tank, the children show emotion and gain affinity amongst each other. Manage these both to change the outcome of their journey!

9N3GWDPV8HBH.title: Cryptocurrency Sentinel
9N3GWDPV8HBH.description: Monitor cryptocurrency prices and set alarms to alert you when they reach target amounts!

9NCK543D5BN6.title: Pirate Monkey Run! 2
9NCK543D5BN6.description: Jake and Jade, your favorite pirate monkeys, are on the run again!

9PMX9NHWXZ4L.title: SCARLET NEXUS Deluxe Edition
9PMX9NHWXZ4L.description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• SCARLET NEXUS (full game)
• Brain Punk Bundle

Deluxe Edition Bonuses:
• Additional Attachment "The Other"
• SAS Plug-in Variations (3)

Choose between Yuito and Kasane, elite psionics each armed with a talent in psychokinesis and their own reason to fight. Complete both of their stories to unlock all the mysteries of a Brain Punk future caught between technology and psychic abilities.

9PLSRQ8B6XL4.title: Worms Rumble - Digital Deluxe Edition
9PLSRQ8B6XL4.description:
Worms Rumble is Worms like you’ve never played it before, with intense, real-time, arena-based 32 player cross-platform combat. Get ready for frantic Deathmatches and intense Last Worm Standing!

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
• Worms Rumble Base Game
• Legends Pack - 6 Outfits – Retro Commando, Sheep, Donkey, Skunk, Cow and Pigeon (each with 3 different colour variants!) 6 Weapon Skins - Retro, Wooly, Concrete, Poison, Bovine, Feathers and 6 Banners

Use a variety of fan-favourite weapons like the Bazooka, Shotgun and Sheep Launcher plus all-new additions to the armoury to bring the pain to your invertebrate opponents as you climb the ranks. Customise your worm, take part in challenges and seasonal events and experiment with new ways to play in The Lab. This is Worms, reinvented.  

The First Real Time Worms! 

You won’t find any turn-based combat in Worms Rumble. Every round is in REAL TIME! If your enemy is raining fire upon you, give them heck right back! 

32 Player Cross Platform Multiplayer 

Play with friends online across console and PC. With Deathmatch and Last Worm Standing solo and squad battle royale modes available at launch! 

Classic Weapons with New Ways to Play 

Arm yourself with new and returning fan-favourite weapons! With classics like the Bazooka, Holy Hand-grenade and Sheep launcher and the all-new Hammerhead, Plasma Blaster and Rocket shield. 

Events, Challenges and ‘The Lab’ 

Take part in seasonal and community events, and daily challenges for additional XP and in-game rewards. And experiment with new gameplay mechanics and weapons in The Lab. Each week brings new experimental game modes with new fun ways to play!

Player Customisations 

Earn XP and in-game currency to unlock and purchase weapon skins, outfits, accessories and emotes! Mix and match to create your own personal style on the battlefield.

9PCVN6LRVV13.title: Gears Triple Bundle
9PCVN6LRVV13.description: Squad up for Gears 5, Gears Tactics and the Gears 5: Hivebusters expansion. From the early days of the Locust war to the jungles of the Galangi islands, experience the pivotal moments in the wars to save Sera. This bundle is optimized for Xbox Series X|S.

9NFT5LFPW5D2.title: SGN Sports Wild Game Hunting
9NFT5LFPW5D2.description:
Collect your gear and let's go hunting. Compete with the best hunters out there. Test your skills with Stag, Rabbit, Boar, Wolf, Eagle, and Duck Hunting. 

Each animal type has ten different challenges. Try for your best score in each. Spend winnings on better and more powerful weapons.

Please note:
Creators Collection games, such as this one,  cannot contain Xbox LIVE achievements and as such cannot increase your GamerScore.
Please be sure to give this game all the required permissions to access Xbox LIVE otherwise Leaderboards and Cloud saving will NOT be available.

Enjoy the great outdoors, weapon at you side, take aim & fire!

9NSB482N7H9W.title: Pirate Monkey Match
9NSB482N7H9W.description:
Jake and Jade, the Pirate Monkeys, star in their own Match Game. Help Jake and Jade master the 100 levels along the path. 

Match 3 or more candies in a row to clear them. More than three results in a power candy that when matched with two others candies of the same color has a powerful effect. Different levels have different requirements to clear. Match a certain number of candies of a certain color, clear all the sugar, find hidden pineapples, drop ingredients such as bananas and coconut milk, and more.

Clear the boards with less than the allowed or moves, or within the time limit. Fail and you'll have to try again.

Please note:
Creators Collection games, such as this one,  cannot contain Xbox LIVE achievements and as such cannot increase your GamerScore.

9N2NKWSZT3LM.title: Notemarks
9N2NKWSZT3LM.description: Simple text note & to-do list tool.

9NGJ7H1LSC0F.title: SnowRunner - 1-Year Anniversary Edition (Windows 10)
9NGJ7H1LSC0F.description:
The 1-Year Anniversary Edition includes the base game SnowRunner and its Year 1 Pass.

Get ready for the next-generation off-road experience!

9N5ZJMZH71S7.title: Pirate Monkey Fruit Shoot
9N5ZJMZH71S7.description:
Jake and Jade, your favorite Pirate Monkeys, are back in a new puzzle game! Play as either Jake or Jade. Throw balls into the air. If you connect with two or more other balls of the same color they will pop away. Any balls that are not touching other objects will fall away. Some balls have a piece of fruit, these are the object of the game. When they fall or pop, a piece of fruit will parachute down to the ground. Collect the amount of fruit that the level requires to win the level.

Destroying or dropping balls of a certain color will count towards earning a power-up. Watch as the tanks on the left fill up. Once full, they will glow signifying you have earned that power-up.  Make sure you use them as they will disappear at the end of the level. 

Can you help Jake and Jade collect as much fruit as they can?

Please note:
Creators Collection games, such as this one,  cannot contain Xbox LIVE achievements and as such cannot increase your GamerScore.

9NCT87FKQ4GM.title: Psychonauts (Windows 10)
9NCT87FKQ4GM.description: A PSYCHIC ODYSSEY THROUGH THE MINDS OF MISFITS, MONSTERS, AND MADMEN

9PDZPRDH9QF5.title: The Wild Case (Full)
9PDZPRDH9QF5.description: The Wild Case is a 2D first-person point-and-click adventure. In this story-focused adventure, players meet a cast of colorful characters, experience mysterious encounters, and solve puzzles to progress through the game.

9NKPFW0MDNL8.title: Gunship Assault
9NKPFW0MDNL8.description:
You're piloting a gunship helicopter on a mission to destroy enemies targets and craft. Watch your radar and long range scanner. Identify targets to destroy to complete your mission. Scout out enemy convoys traversing the terrain. Be on the look out for enemy aircraft such as fighter jets, drones, and even enemy gunships. We are counting on you!

The action is fast and furious. Take charge as you're at the controls to complete these important missions.

** Note:
This game supports leaderboards for fastest completion time. You must complete all missions at a difficulty to post to the leaderboard. For example, complete all 10 Easy missions to post the total time to complete them to the Easy leaderboard.
Creators Collection games, such as this one,  cannot contain Xbox LIVE achievements and as such cannot increase your GamerScore.
Please be sure to give this game all the required permissions to access Xbox LIVE otherwise Leaderboards and Cloud saving will NOT be available.

9NT73XSW7VCW.title: Ball Race
9NT73XSW7VCW.description:
In the game, one gamer or from two to four gamer compete against each other controlling their own balls and try to defeat their opponent, navigating a maze full of challenges and surprises in order to reach the finish line first. Racing tracks are full of dangers, such as jumping spiders that make it difficult for players to succeed, as well as auxiliary elements such as blocks to knock the player up and moving platforms to overcome chasms. By collecting diamonds and stars, players gain an advantage that allows them to jump and move faster.

Players can choose selected routes or compete in a tournament, where the competition takes place on all 9 routes in turn. Each route has its record score that can be beaten. Relaxing music plays in the background, adding extra comfort and atmosphere during the game. Ball Race is great entertainment for anyone who likes challenges and competition.

9N9WWM5JXCBZ.title: Yakuza 6: The Song of Life for Windows 10
9N9WWM5JXCBZ.description:
How far would you go for family? Step into Japan's criminal underworld with fists swinging in this explosive action brawler starring legendary yakuza, Kazuma Kiryu, who is hellbent on uncovering the truth behind a tragic accident that left his daughter comatose.

Master bone-breaking combos, customize your combat abilities, and indulge in all the vices that Tokyo's red light district of Kamurocho has to offer in the emotional conclusion of Kazuma Kiryu's saga.

9P5MBBFF3RNT.title: Ori: The Collection
9P5MBBFF3RNT.description: Play both award-winning games of Ori and the Blind Forest and Ori and the Will of the Wisps in this collection.

9MWKBSSKXG9J.title: Thumbnail & Tag Downloader
9MWKBSSKXG9J.description: Thumbnail and Tag Download App For Video is an app designed to help users quickly and easily download thumbnails, tags of their favorite videos. The app allows users to search for videos by tags or thumbnails and then download the associated tags, and thumbnails in a matter of seconds. With this app, users can quickly find the exact video they want and quickly download the associated tags, and thumbnails with ease.

9MVX1V7W5SW8.title: Yakuza 5 Remastered for Windows 10
9MVX1V7W5SW8.description:
Experience the fifth chapter of the Kazuma Kiryu saga in 1080p and 60fps.

In December 2012, Kazuma Kiryu left his past as a "legendary yakuza" and his place of peace in Okinawa.

He now spends his days as a cab driver in a corner of Fukuoka's red-light district, hiding his true identity. All for the sake of fulfilling the "dream" of an important person.

However, a disturbing atmosphere begins to drift through the supposedly well-balanced society of the Kanto and Kansai yakuza, emerging as a plot to drag all of the yakuza organizations in Japan to war.

In order to protect the "dreams" of his loved one, Kiryu is drawn into the vortex of battle once again.

This is the story of four men and a girl chasing their "dreams" in five major cities in Japan, presented on the largest scale of the series yet.

Complete The Dragon of Dojima’s journey.

9NBTL551XL5N.title: The Yakuza Remastered Collection for Windows 10
9NBTL551XL5N.description: Celebrate Kazuma Kiryu's saga with the beautifully remastered Yakuza 3, 4, and 5. Complete The Dragon of Dojima’s journey.

9NC4QMRHCNZK.title: Yakuza 3 Remastered for Windows 10
9NC4QMRHCNZK.description:
Experience the third chapter of the Kazuma Kiryu saga with restored content in 1080p and 60fps.

A year after the Kanto-Kansai all-out war, Kazuma Kiryu and Haruka Sawamura have left the unforgiving streets of Kamurocho for the island of Okinawa to run the Morning Glory Orphanage. Despite his efforts, shadows of Kiryu's past threaten to entangle the Morning Glory Orphanage in a deadly power struggle involving the Tojo Clan and political world. 

Thus begins a dramatic tale set in the "sleepless city" of Kamurocho in Tokyo and the tropical lands of Okinawa. Can Kiryu rescue the children of the orphanage from the looming threats emerging from the depths of the underworld and state power?

Complete The Dragon of Dojima’s journey.

1-3 players will take control of the Battletoads and team up to storm through wild and unpredictable stages with only one rule – expect the unexpected. 9N9WZT3PJ27W.title: Halo: Reach
9N9WZT3PJ27W.description:
Halo: Reach* comes to PC as the first installment of Halo: The Master Chief Collection. Now optimized for PC, experience the heroic story of Noble Team, a group of Spartans, who through great sacrifice and courage, saved countless lives in the face of impossible odds. The planet Reach is humanity’s last line of defense between the encroaching Covenant and their ultimate goal, the destruction of Earth. If it falls, humanity will be pushed to the brink of destruction. 

Game Features:
•	PC Settings/Optimizations: Halo: Reach is now optimized for PC and looking better than ever at up to 4k UHD and at least 60 FPS. Other PC native settings include mouse and keyboard support, ultrawide support, adaptive sync support, FOV customization, and more. 
•	Campaign: Experience the first chapter in the Halo Saga and fight your way as Noble Six through 11 unforgettable missions
•	Multiplayer: Start your Spartan Career today with Halo: Reach’s iconic multiplayer featuring an overhauled progression system, generation-defining player customization, over 20 unforgettable maps, as well as classic game modes such as Firefight and Invasion. While Forge and Theater will be delivered later in 2020, enjoy access to millions of community-created maps and game types that have been migrated over from Halo: Reach on Xbox 360 for use today on PC.
•	Firefight: Fight alone or with squad mates to survive against endless waves of enemies deploying with ever-increasing difficulty. 


*Halo: The Master Chief Collection is required to play the (digital only) Halo: Reach.

9NTM9HXNLSZX.title: Halo: The Master Chief Collection
9NTM9HXNLSZX.description: The Master Chief’s iconic journey includes six games, built for PC and collected in a single integrated experience. Whether you’re a long-time fan or meeting Spartan 117 for the first time, The Master Chief Collection is the definitive Halo gaming experience.

WritingFX is an EPUB creation tool for Windows. Everyone is creator with WritingFX! Whether you are an individual author or publisher, you can quickly create your own e-book files (.epub) without any programming skills.

Just focus on writing, and WritingFX can handle the rest. It will generate high-quality e-book files for you!

9P09GZGBBRPZ.title: Fleet Force
9P09GZGBBRPZ.description: You have a fleet and you must control the enemy. Play over 24 levels and 8 ships with configurable weapons against other fleets in a distant galaxy.

9N104TMQWFH8.title: BlackJack X
9N104TMQWFH8.description: Blackjack X brings the exciting game of Blackjack to your Xbox or Windows Device with Beautiful Graphics and an easy to use User Interface.  Blackjack X allows you to split, double down and take Insurance just like you were in a real casino. It also features an online Xbox Leaderboard.

9WZDNCRFJ4P3.title: TouchMail
9WZDNCRFJ4P3.description:
[Updated November 2022] The top-rated email app for Windows 10 and 11, with over 1.5 million downloads, and one of Microsoft's "Essential Windows Apps". Works great with touch, or quickly scroll and browse with your mouse or touchpad.

- Recent update: App load time significantly faster!
- “A super-efficient way to blast through vast quantities of mail” – Time
- "I had over 30k junk emails until I saw this app. I was able to organize, clean and manage 3 accounts within 10 min." - Wendi (User review)

TouchMail is the fastest and easiest way to find what matters most and clean up the rest in Gmail, Outlook.com, Yahoo Mail, iCloud, AOL, Office 365, and most IMAP email accounts. 

Turn your email into a visual and colorful inbox that you can explore the way you want – using touch, mouse and keyboard, or pen – with rich visualizations, colorful message tiles you can resize, and familiar interactions.

- "I had over 4,400 emails, most of which was junk. TouchMail makes it so easy to group, select and delete mass emails. I am now down to 20 emails in my inbox." - Paige (User review)

- “Will make getting into your emails cleaner, faster, and much more fun” - WinBeta Review

- "I have Gmail, Hotmail and Yahoo. TouchMail makes it easy to handle all three at one sitting - using the same interface for all three. It's easy to delete a lot of email at once!" - Alicia (User review)

9NPKQ7SRLV1L.title: Scorpio Player - The Best Music & Video Player
9NPKQ7SRLV1L.description: SCORPIO PLAYER is a modern and full-feature powerful universal media player for Windows 10, Xbox

9P5M0VH236FN.title: PDF Reader UWP
9P5M0VH236FN.description:
PDF Reader UWP let you to read your favorite PDF format book anywhere anytime. 
Try it out!

9MZZNL8J2MSZ.title: Broken Age
9MZZNL8J2MSZ.description: Broken Age is a timeless coming-of-age story of barfing trees and talking spoons. Vella Tartine and Shay Volta are two teenagers in strangely similar situations, but radically different worlds. The player can freely switch between their stories, helping them take control of their own lives, and dealing with the unexpected adventures that follow.

9P7WRZWT294V.title: Stellar Interface
9P7WRZWT294V.description:
Fight In Ever Changing Space Battles!

Run through the universe, discover the numerous perks/consumables and their synergistic effects. Explore the randomly-generated galaxy to find merchants, unlock spacecrafts, collect StellarNetES Cartridges, checkmark your kills of the various galactic overlords.

And die. A lot!

Can you find the most outrageous perk combination to defeat the Last Overlord? 


Rogue-like Elements: With a randomly generated universe and randomized perks, no journey will ever be the same! What will happen to you, in your own unique apocalyptic cataclysmic transgalactic voyage?

Synergistic Perk System: Over 100 perks and consumables! Look out for the synergistic nature of the perks that suits your playstyle!

Galactic Bounties: ​​Complete over 100 missions to participate in the StellarNET Entertainment System lottery!

Customize Your Start: Choose your spacecraft: there is one for every playstyle, as they have unique starting perks. You can personalize your arsenal from numerous weapons: cannons, missiles and lasers!

Unlock Spacecrafts, View Your Progress: Check out what have you accomplished in our in-game encyclopedia StellarNET. Unlock new spacecrafts, kill all the bosses to progress in StellarNET's kill table. Check which perks and consumables you have used and seen, and what is your progress towards the achievements! 

Explore the Universe: Some levels are more special than others: Merchants, Bosses, Spacecraft Factories. Fight through lower-difficulty levels to stock up on perks, or just streamline to the end-boss if you feel powerful enough!

Controller Support: Plug-and-play with any kind of controller!

9NBLGGH51BMC.title: Killer Instinct: Definitive Edition
9NBLGGH51BMC.description:
FIGHT ON!
Discover your Killer Instinct! Play the legendary fighting game with stunning 60FPS visuals, over-the-top action, a wild cast of combatants, rocking reactive music, and C-C-C-COMBO BREAKERS!

9NBLGGH4PBBM.title: Gears of War 4
9NBLGGH4PBBM.description: A new saga begins for one of the most acclaimed video game franchises in history. Supports Xbox Play Anywhere: yours to play on both Xbox One and Windows 10 PC at no additional cost.

9NBLGGH1Z6FQ.title: ReCore
9NBLGGH1Z6FQ.description:
From legendary creator Keiji Inafune and the makers of Metroid Prime comes the “ReCore Definitive Edition”, an action-adventure masterfully crafted for a new generation.
 
As one of the last remaining humans, forge friendships with courageous robotic companions and lead them on an epic adventure through a mysterious dynamic world.
 
Includes the new “Eye of Obsidian” adventure and “T8-NK” Corebot frame!

9NBLGGH4V2WG.title: Flight Unlimited X
9NBLGGH4V2WG.description:
Soar across the beautiful skies of the San Francisco bay area, Las Vegas, and Switzerland.  Flight Unlimited utilizes advanced streaming technology to provide some of the best visuals in flight simulation.  

The San Francisco scenery is so detailed you can even find your house.  

The campaign tasks with you missions such as rescuing a prisoner from Alcatraz, B2 Bomber surveillance over the Swiss Alps, landing your Cessna on the Golden Gate Bridge, and more!  

Over two years in the making, Flight Unlimited has been redesigned from the ground up by an aviation expert.

Buzz the Golden Gate Bridge, take a fly-by of Alcatraz, scream past Levi Field, and even take a look at the future home of the world champion Golden State Warriors.  

Pilot 13 Aircraft

- Cessna 172
- A10 Thunderbolt
- Challenger Learjet
- P40 Mustang
- Pitts Special
- Robin DR300
- D3 Douglas
- C130 Hercules
- F/A-18 Hornet
- F22 Raptor 
- Boeing 747
- Ultralight
- AWACS

C521HDXRTS7F.title: Wasteland 2: Director's Cut
C521HDXRTS7F.description: From the Producer of the original Fallout comes Wasteland 2, the sequel to the first-ever post-apocalyptic computer RPG! With over 80 hours of gameplay, you will deck out your Ranger squad with the most devastating weaponry this side of the fallout zone, test the limits of your strategy skills, and bring justice to the wasteland - the choices are yours, but so are the consequences.

9N68F8TM7TKW.title: Thymesia
9N68F8TM7TKW.description:
Thymesia is a gruelling action-RPG with fast-paced combat and an intricate plague weapon system. 
In a kingdom where death spreads, play as a mysterious character known only as "Corvus". Prey upon your enemies, wield the power of disease and find the truth in your own memories.

9NH6WL63G681.title: Appel Game
9NH6WL63G681.description:
★★★ STORY ★★★
Micro Manager, in his desperation to gain the power of the golden apples has begun to take control of planet Appelmoeshapje. As Micro Manager's influence grows, Appel finds not only the inhabitants of, but the very world is turning against him! - Help Appel to navigate through each level, avoiding danger, collecting as many golden apples as you can before finally facing Micro Manager and restoring peace to the world.

★★★ CONTROLS ★★★
• Arrow Keys or WASD to run, jump & crouch
• Wall Jump - by touching a wall and pressing 'up'
• Jump Higher - by holding up for longer
• Stick to the ceiling - by holding up - But be careful, you can't move sideways when 'stuck' to a surface
• Crouch by holding down (you can crouch on the floor, but also the walls and ceiling!)
• Q + R - to quickly restart the level
• Complete a level, then click 'replay' and then pause for an option to save your replay (load them back in the Play / Load option)

Wait a few seconds for xbox controller.

9NNSQ8K3PC67.title: Blue Spiderhuman in Adventure
9NNSQ8K3PC67.description:
We have a hero who can throw a web like a spider and this hero encounters various enemies.
There are two games in package.

9PH779KSQN98.title: Yellow Chess
9PH779KSQN98.description: How would you like to play the standard Chess game with this design? Play a match against the computer and see how fast it plays, maybe you will win?

9NPGN9K4W97C.title: Super Chess
9NPGN9K4W97C.description: You can play it with AI (your device brain) . It is classic chess game. It has undo and redo features.

9N88HSBP6RJ8.title: MotoGP™20 - Windows Edition
9N88HSBP6RJ8.description: This year, experience all the thrills of the more-complete-than-ever Managerial Career mode and enjoy new technical improvements and graphics. Customize your bike and suit! Compete against the MotoGP™ legends or challenge your friends online!

9P7CX4LNHQHM.title: Lonesome Fireplace (in 4K)
9P7CX4LNHQHM.description: "Lonesome Fireplace" takes you to a lonely cabin in the mountains. Watch the fireplace or look out the window at a breathtaking mountain panorama. You can change the weather outside as you like. In your exposed hut, in particular turbulent weather feels very alive.

9NF83PRZK6K3.title: Tell Me Why: Chapters 1-3
9NF83PRZK6K3.description: Episode 1 now FREE! Tell Me Why is the multi-award winning episodic adventure game from Dontnod Entertainment in which twins use their supernatural bond to discover the truth of their troubled past.

9NBLGGH5XZ2Z.title: Operation Center 16 Premium
9NBLGGH5XZ2Z.description: Fast & reliable file manager with two file windows and ZIP and FTP support. Drag & drop with acoustic feedback allows you to copy and move files and folders easily. The file preview displays files without the need to open them. In addition to the file manager, an editor, photo manager and various tools for maintaining the PC are included.

9NBLGGH3SH5Q.title: TPipingHMI
9NBLGGH3SH5Q.description: "TPipingHMI" is a viewer and a visual designer of the mimic diagrams for the  IoT based automation projects. It is  an client for accessing the automation data from the  devices such as "Raspberry PI", "Arduino",   Windows PC  or PLC, supporting IP  or Bluetooth protocols.

9P1NT5CKRM6M.title: Familienforschungs-Paket – Stammbaum erstellen
9P1NT5CKRM6M.description:
Mit dem Familienforschungs-Paket erstellen Sie ohne lange Einarbeitung Ihren Familienstammbaum. Passen Sie auf Knopfdruck sein Aussehen an und drucken Sie ihn aus. Die Software ist selbsterklärend und lässt sich intuitiv bedienen. Stammbäume können von jeder beliebigen Person ausgehend automatisch visualisiert werden – wahlweise mit einer Beschränkung auf eine bestimmte Anzahl an Generationen. Aber auch ganz ohne Beschränkung.

Dank der eingebauten GEDCOM-Schnittstelle können Sie Stammbäume mit anderen Familienforschern teilen.

Mit an Bord ist ein Tool zur Fotokorrektur, mit welchem Sie alte Bilder aufbessern können. Mit dem Tool zum Bedrucken von Briefumschlägen bedrucken Sie ohne lästiges Justieren Briefumschläge.

9N1LH09FSR20.title: Write-a-Document 6.1
9N1LH09FSR20.description: A good word processor doesn't have to be expensive. Create letters, documents, annual calendars and even form letters with "Write-a-Document". You can open Word documents, export documents as PDF and print on envelopes.

9MXW8C1G6L0K.title: Post Office TracKing
9MXW8C1G6L0K.description:
Track and track your post office orders, all very easy. Get notified whenever the status is updated, everything at your fingertips!
Post Office tracking uniting ease and practicality for you! (exclusive for orders from the Brazilian Post Office)

9N3JXK506JKG.title: Pirate Monkey Kindergarten
9N3JXK506JKG.description: Your child can practice their Kindergarten skills with Jake and Jade. Based on recommendations by leading educators, Pirate Monkey Kindergarten™ reinforces the skills your child is learning at school.

9PLDWR49JZC6.title: Pirate Monkey Preschool
9PLDWR49JZC6.description: Jake and Jade help your child get ready for school. Based on recommendations by leading educators, Pirate Monkey Preschool™ teaches early learning skills. Schools today expect your child to know these important skills before they enter Kindergarten. Let Jake and Jade, the Pirate Monkeys, help your child reinforce these skills to practice with their Preschool work or even if they haven't attended.

9PB2D6M3WJTL.title: イハナシの魔女
9PB2D6M3WJTL.description:
このちっぽけな島が
俺たちの生きていく島だ。

PC版で好評を博したラブコメｘファンタジーノベルアドベンチャーが登場！

◆ストーリー
幼い頃に両親を亡くした「西銘光」は、高校一年生の春、育ての親である叔母から祖父の家で暮らすよう言い渡される。
1人フェリーに乗って向かったのは人口1000人にも満たない沖縄の離島「渡夜時島」。
不安を胸に祖父の家を訪ねるも、祖父は海外へ移住してしまっていた。

事情を尋ねるべく叔母に連絡を取るが音信不通。
転校先の高校にも西銘光という生徒は在籍していないと告げられる。

光は叔母一家に捨てられたのだ。
途方に暮れた彼は夜のサトウキビ畑をさまよう。
そこで不思議な衣装に身を包んだ少女「リルゥ」に出会った。

自活力皆無の元高校一年生の光。
日本の常識をまるで介さないリルゥ。

2人は協力し合って小さな島で暮らしていく。
しかし、リルゥには渡夜時島へとやって来た目的があり……。

◆特別コンテンツ
一部のPC版に実装された設定資料に加え、コミックマーケット101で頒布された冊子「Append」に収録された小説を、ゲーム仕様の電子書籍形式で収録しております。

9P96NVG9SKJN.title: 诗词百话
9P96NVG9SKJN.description: 诗词之美，由来久矣，欣赏的是作品，感悟的是人生。
